departments_description: Group staff into departments and give them a manager to approve their leave.
department_limit_go_upgrade: You have reached your department limit, go to upgrade
department_limit_go_upgrade_description: In the Free Plan, you can create up to 2 departments, in the Mini Plan up to 4, in the Plan up to 8, and in the Plus Plan an unlimited number of departments.
calendar_sync_limit_go_upgrade: You have reached your calendar sync limit, go to upgrade
calendar_sync_limit_go_upgrade_descripti: In the Essentials Plan you can sync 1 calendar and purchase additional ones via add-ons.
In the Mini Plan you can sync 1 calendar.
In the Essentials Plan you can sync up to 5 calendars.
Leave_types_description: Create different categories for different days off.
Reason_Mandatory_Description: Enable this toggle to mandate filling out the absence reason field when requesting this leave type
Leave_types_Deduct_from_allowance_descri: If this is enabled, the duration of the absence is deducted from the user's allowance when it is used. If it is disabled, nothing is deducted from the allowance.
Categorize_as_Tracked_To_Dynamics_365_in: Categorize as 'Tracked to Dynamics 365' in Outlook

When enabled, absences of this type will be marked with the 'Tracked To Dynamics 365' category in the user's Outlook calendar. This facilitates seamless integration and tracking in Dynamics 365. Ensure this category is available in the user's Outlook.
Leave_types_Requires_approval_descriptio: If this absence is used by a user and this is enabled, the manager must approve the absence. Otherwise, none will receive an approval request.
Leave_types_ignore_public_holidays_descr: Treat public holidays as regular workdays when calculating leave.
Leave_types_ignore_schedule_description: Ignore disabled workdays in the schedule when calculating leave, but still use working hours for calculation.
Leave_types_Include_in_maximum_absent_de: In the departments, you can maintain the maximum number of persons who may be absent at the same time. If it is enabled, it means that this absence ensures that no more people are absent than is configured in the department. If this is disabled, the setting in the department is disregarded.
Leave_types_privacy_description: If this is disabled, it means that everyone can see the employee's reason for absence. If it is enabled, the reason can only be seen by the approver, manager and admins.
Default_Settings_Description: This setting is a global setting and will be applied to all new users invited to absentify. This setting has no effect on your personal profile. You can change your personal settings on the top right of your profile picture/gear.
Default_Name_Format_Description: This setting specifies how the names should be displayed in the application. This will change the display name for all users.
Fiscal_year_starts_month_description: This setting specifies the month in which the fiscal year starts. This will change the calendar view for all users.
Calendar_view_description: The calendar view displays a user's absences for an entire year, similar to the 'My calendar' feature in the main menu. With this option disabled, only the user, their manager/approver and the administrator will have access to the user's calendar.
absences_in_the_past_description: If this feature is enabled, all users can see both past and future absences. However, if it is disabled, only managers, approvers, and admins can view an employee's past absences, while all others can only see future absences.
Other_departments_description: When activated, this setting allows users to view the calendars of all departments. If disabled, users will only be able to see the calendar of their own department. Please note that this restriction does not apply to admin users, who will maintain full access to all calendars.
Add_public_holiday_description: After saving, you can change, delete or add the imported holidays.
Name: Name
public_holidays_description: View and customise the dates for your active public holiday locations.
Microsoft_Integration_Description: These are global settings. You need Microsoft Tenant Admin rights to edit these settings.
Export_Description: Export your data and use it further
Outlook_calendar_synchronization_descrip: By default, when an absence is created or updated in absentify, we send a calendar invitation to the user via email. If you enable this feature, the user will no longer receive an email, but we will create the Outlook calendar entry directly in their calendar. (Note: Only new requests are synchronized. Retroactive synchronization does not take place).
Outlook_Mailbox_settings_description: absentify can configure an automatic out-of-office message in the user's Outlook for each absence. Each user can create a message template for each leave type in its profile.
Outlook_Mailbox_settings_revoke_question: Are you sure you want to revoke the permission? Then no out-of-office note will be set for all users in the future. They will not be informed about it. Please take over this!
Users_settings_description: absentify can synchronize users and their settings from your Microsoft tenant. This is a global setting, and you need Microsoft Tenant Admin rights to set these settings. Once the feature is activated, a user's manager from Microsoft can be automatically synchronized with their designated approver in absentify, provided that the manager has also been added to your organization's absentify account.
Users_settings_revoke_question: Are you sure you want to revoke the permission? Then no user will be synchronized in the future. They will not be informed about it. Please take over this!
Groups_settings: Teams and Entra ID (Azure Active Directory) Groups synchronization
Groups_settings_description: Enable this permission to use the feature that automatically links departments with Entra ID. Whenever new users are added to or removed from a group, this change is also reflected in absentify. Sync group managers in Microsoft with department managers in absentify, ensuring that the managers in both systems are aligned. You can also simplify the Excel import process by pre-filling it with data from Entra ID.
Groups_settings_revoke_question: Are you sure you want to revoke the permission?
AI_Bot_enabled_settings_description: With the Azure AI integration, our Teams Bot can automatically record and manage absences. This feature is disabled by default, so no data is sent to an AI unless the feature is enabled. We cover the cost of using Azure AI, but this feature is only available to users on the Plus plan. Enable this feature to save time and reduce manual effort. The integration is seamless within the Microsoft Teams environment and provides accurate absence tracking.
Delete_company_account_description1: This will immediately delete all users and data.
Delete_company_account_description2: Permanently remove the company account and all of its contents from the absentify platform. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
Delete_Confirm: Realy delete all data? - No restore possible!!
Delete_in_Teams: You can't delete the entire company in Microsoft Teams/Outlook, you have to go to the web application.
GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
No_plan: A subscription plan is required to apply additional filters.
Webhooks_description: Use webhooks to receive notifications from absentify whenever requests are created or updated. This allows you to build integrations on top of absentify.
URLs_for_receiving_webhooks_description: You can add up to 3 endpoints to receive the events
allLog: A log of all events has been sent to you.
WebhookRemoveSubTitle: Are you sure you want to remove the {{value}} webhook?
absentify_Integrations_description: Connect your favorite apps to absentify
Integrations_description_available_in_sm: This integration is available starting from the Mini Plan.
Integration_description_available_in_ent: This integration is available in Plus Plan only.
power_automate_description: Integrate absentify with Microsoft Power Automate.
power_automate_description_long: Microsoft Power Automate is a cloud-based service that helps you create automated workflows between absentify and your favorite apps and services. You can respond when an absence is created or changed in absentify. Start your workflow and pass this information to other applications. Microsoft Power Automate allows you to link the absences from absentify to numerous other apps without any programming.
calendar_sync_description: Set up absentify to work with a shared or group Outlook calendar!
calendar_sync_description_note: Please note that this setup is designed for tracking department-wide time off, not individual leave. If you’re looking to link a person's absentify absences to their personal Outlook Calendar, refer to this guide here:
calendar_sync_description_long_1: You can connect absentify to a shared or group Outlook calendar in two ways: direct synchronization for immediate updates, or using iCal. iCal also lets you send email invites to any address.
calendar_sync_description_long_2: Adjust settings to control which types of leave, leave statuses, and departments are reflected in the Outlook calendar, including how they're labeled.
timeghost_description_long_1: timeghost is a time management tool for tracking working and project times. Users can manage their times independently and benefit from the seamless integration into Teams and the O365 world. The documented times can be used to create timesheets for users and invoices for project clients.
timeghost_description_long_2: Thanks to the connection between timeghost and absentify, absence entries are automatically generated in timeghost for user absences created in absentify. This eliminates the need for all users to manually document absences due to vacation or sickness in timeghost and to compensate for the resulting target hours.
api_key_subscription: An API (Application Programming Interface) is an interface that allows different software applications to communicate and interact with each other. With the API integration in absentify, users can seamlessly connect their absence management to other systems and applications, enabling them to work more efficiently and optimize their business processes.
calendar_sync_setting_message: Calendar Sync are available in Paid-Plans.
calendar_sync_setting_email_sync_add_mes: Email synchronization: Only future absences are synchronized, absences that have already been created in absentify are not included in this synchronization.
calendar_sync_setting_email_sync_message: Email synchronization: No changes are synchronized to the past, all changes are applied only to the future. You need to manually change absences that were already synchronized in the past in your calendar.
api_description_long: An API (Application Programming Interface) is an interface that allows different software applications to communicate and interact with each other. With the API integration in absentify, users can seamlessly connect their absence management to other systems and applications, enabling them to work more efficiently and optimize their business processes.
Calendar_was_selected_by_another_user_an: Calendar was selected by another user and cannot be changed.
You_need_write_permission: We have not found a calendar that you can access. You need write access to the shared calendar.
You_need_write_permission_group: We have not found a calendar that you can access. You need write access to the group calendar.
first_inherit_permission_outlook: We do not have access to your Microsoft Outlook Calendar. You have to give absentify the permissions first. Go to Settings / Microsoft and set the 'Outlook calendar synchronization' permission.
no_permission_group: We do not have access to your Microsoft Group Calendars. Click here to get the 'Group calendar synchronization' permission.
calendarSyncSetting_description: Give this connection a name and a description.
config_leave_types_description: Select which types of leave types should be synchronized to the calendar. You can change the name of the calendar entry and assign your own one. This name will then be visible to users in the destination calendar. E.g. sickness = absent.
calendar_sync_modal_description: Create and configure calendar synchronizations according to your needs
calendar_sync_Departments_descrip: You can set from which departments the absences should be synchronized to the calendar.
Calendar_choice_descript: Select a type of calendar, currently we support shared Outlook calendars (you need write permissions) or an email address to which we send iCal calendar invitations.
additional_frill_info: We'd love to hear from you! Please share any feedback on what's missing or suggestions for improvements
CalSyncRemoveSubTitle: Are you sure you want to remove the {{value}} Calendar Sync?
linear-all-must-agree_description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
linear-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
parallel-all-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
parallel-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
you-need-to-upgrade-department-descripti: You need the "More than one Approver" add-on to add multiple managers to this department.
you-need-to-upgrade-description2: Click Upgrade to get additional information.
you-need-to-upgrade-user-description: You need the add-on "More than one approver" to add multiple approvers to this user or to use synchronization with the Microsoft profile.
upgradeT1: You need the 'More than one Approver' add-on to use this feature.
integration_desc4: Connect absentify with other systems and applications.
integration_desc5: Receive absentify notifications at your endpoint.
integration_desc6: Integrate absentify with Microsoft Power BI.
powerbi_description: Microsoft Power BI is a cloud-based service that helps you visually represent and derive deep business insights from your absentify data. With the connector to Power BI, you can easily import absentify data and present it in compelling dashboards and reports. Power BI enables you to analyze and visualize absences, leave requests, and other employee data from absentify. You can identify trends, spot patterns, and make informed decisions to optimize your business processes. The advantage of Power BI lies in the fact that you can perform these data analyses and visualizations without any programming skills. With Microsoft Power BI and absentify, you can fully harness the power of your data.
Outlook_Calendar_entry_show_as_Descripti: Select the availability under which this absence should appear as in the user's Outlook calendar.
Event_Subject_Description_Outlook: This setting will set an event subject accordingly in Outlook.
Event_Subject_Description_iCal: This setting will set an event subject accordingly in the iCal calendar. If unspecified, the subject will be the same as the absence type.
Outlook_Synchronization_Settings_Descrip: Determine the absence details as they should appear in the user's Outlook calendar. This feature can be deactivated under 'Settings' > 'Microsoft Integration'
Global_Display_calendar_weeks_descriptio: The calendar weeks displays a number of each calendar week in overview and my calendar. This setting applies to all new users invited by absentify but can be changed in personal settings.
iCal_entry_show_as_Description: Select the availability under which this absence should appear when the user approves the calendar invitation.
Manager_cancel_request_in_the_past: Retroactive absence cancellation by department manager
Manager_cancel_request_in_the_past_descr: Enable this toggle to grant department managers the ability to cancel absence requests that have already started or occurred in the past. When disabled, this functionality remains exclusive to administrators. It's important to note that regular employees will still only be able to cancel their future absence requests. Any cancellation, regardless of the user, will trigger an email notification to all relevant parties.
Microsoft_AutomaticReplies_Description: absentify can configure the automatic out of office replies in Outlook for you. You can configure one out-of-office message per leave type. When that absence occurs, absentify will configure the same day out of office message into your Outlook setting.
Microsoft_AutomaticReplies_Description_2: This feature is still brand new, we appreciate any
outOfOfficeExternalMessagePlaceholder:
Hi there,

Thank you for your email. I am currently out of the office and will return on {{dateOfReturn}}.

If you require immediate assistance, please contact {{approverName[1]}} at {{approverMail[1]}}. Otherwise, I will respond to your message as soon as possible upon my return.

Best regards,

{{name}}
outOfOfficeInternalMessagePlaceholder:
Hi there,

I am currently out of the office and will return on {{dateOfReturn}}.

If you need assistance, please reach out to {{approverName[1]}}, who is handling my tasks while I am away.

For urgent matters, feel free to message me on Microsoft Teams.

Thank you,

{{name}}
outOfOfficeOutsideHeaderDescription: Update this templates using custom properties for send automatic reply messages to senders outside your organization.
outOfOfficeInsideHeaderDescription: Update this templates using custom properties for send automatic reply messages to senders inside your organization.
LeaveTypeDesc: Choose a leave type this out of office message will be assigned to.
delete_message: If you want to delete out of office message, choose members and press Delete.
EnableOutOfOfficeMessgageForLeaveType: Enable out of office message for this leave type?
confirm_delete_auto_reply: Are you sure you want to delete the out of office notification for this leave type?
Some_deleted: Some users have a deleted out of office message setting. The changes you provide won't apply to those who doesn't have an out of office message setting. Do you wish to restore deleted out of office messages for this leave type?
ChooseUsersDesc: Choose the users whose out-of-office messages you want to create, edit or delete.
Can_user_edit: A predefined out-of-office message for the selected leave type has been set in this wizard. Employees have the option to modify this predefined message directly within their absentify settings. If this option is disabled within absentify, employees can still alter the message later in Outlook after it has been set by absentify. We have no control over changes made in Outlook.
integration_desc7: Manage the out-of-office messages of your employees
outlook_oof_desc: This feature empowers administrators to manage all employee out-of-office messages from a central dashboard. Create uniform out-of-office responses for your entire team that automatically populate each employee's Outlook profile when they're away. Use placeholders for personalized details like expected return date or current supervisor to ensure clear and consistent communication. This enhances operational efficiency and streamlines workflow. Available exclusively in the Plus plan.
Add_new_oof: Add or Edit out of office message
Remove_oof: Are you sure you want to remove out of office messages for the selected leave types for all selected members({{number}})?
Select_departament_uses: Select a department from which users will be taken.
allow_useres_to_edit_oof: Allow to edit out of office message
allow_member_h3: Allow employees to customize their own Out-of-Office Message
allow_member_checkbox: Allow customization of the out-of-office message by employees
reason_hint_text_description: Hint Text is a guiding text that appears in the 'reason' field to prompt users on what to input. The text automatically disappears when users start typing.
allowances_description: You can define allowances here, which can then be used to debit absences. The allowances can then be selected in the leave types.
allowance_limit_go_upgrade: More allowances? Upgrade to your Plan!
allowance_limit_go_upgrade_description: In the free plan of absentify, you can only manage a single absence allowance. By upgrading to a higher plan, you'll have the ability to create multiple allowances and assign them individually in the Leave Type. This provides more flexibility and customization options for your absence management.
allowances_ignore_limit_description: Allow employees to take more leave than allocated.
allowances_allowance_unit_description: Choose 'Days' for daily tracking or 'Hours' for hourly calculation of allowances.
allowances_default_default_allowance_nex: After creation, all employees will receive this allowance, you can then customize it for each employee individually.
allowances_default_allowance_current_yea: After creation, all employees will receive this allowance, you can then customize it for each employee individually.
only_on_desktop: Sorry, the Excel export feature is not supported on mobile devices. Please switch to a desktop to use this function.
choose_members_error: At least one member must be choosed to proceed
active_tooltip: Toggle this option to activate the synchronization for the selected type of leave. If this option is turned off, leaves of this type will not be transferred to your calendar.
onlyApproved_tooltip: Enable this switch to synchronize only approved leave requests. This ensures that only approved absences are displayed in your calendar.
integration_desc8: Synchronization with Microsoft Microsoft Entra ID/Teams
ad_group_sync_desc: Enhance your absentify experience by utilizing the Microsoft Entra ID/Teams Group Synchronization feature. This powerful tool allows for a seamless integration between absentify and your existing Microsoft Entra ID (AD) or Microsoft Teams groups. By synchronizing with Microsoft Entra ID/Teams, you can efficiently manage departmental assignments based on group memberships, ensuring that your organizational structure within absentify reflects the most up-to-date information. With customizable settings, you can automate the creation of user accounts, respond to group changes, manage automatic archiving of inactive users, and even track managerial changes within your groups. This integration not only streamlines the management of user roles and permissions but also simplifies the onboarding and offboarding processes, reducing manual administrative tasks and improving overall system accuracy. Keep your team's absence management in perfect alignment with your organizational changes with absentify's Microsoft Entra ID/Teams Group Synchronization.
add_new_group_sync: Add new Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group synchronization
ad_group_setting_modal: Provide a distinctive name and a clear description for your synchronization mapping. These details will be displayed within the absentify table solely for identification and administrative purposes. Ensure the name is unique and the description accurately reflects the relationship between the Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group and the corresponding absentify department.
select_dep_desc: Select a group from Microsoft Entra ID/Teams groups which you want to synchronize.
group_dep_sync_desc: Select the department(s) within absentify that will be synchronized with your chosen Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group. This step establishes a link between your group members and their corresponding departments.
automatic_acc_create_desc: Enable this feature to automatically generate absentify accounts for users not currently in the absentify system. These new accounts will be set to inactive status, and a notification will be sent to all administrators.
response_to_group_changes: Manage department membership on group updates and archive users not assigned to departments
response_to_group_changes_desc: Choose this option to ensure that when employees are removed from an Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group, their association with corresponding departments in absentify is also removed. Also this setting will automatically archive employees who are not linked to any departments post-synchronization. Administrators will receive an email notification of this action. Archived employees will maintain their department assignments according to the last sync settings. Please note that any automatic archiving or department removal will be delayed by 10 minutes to accommodate further group changes.
synchronization_settings: Customize your Microsoft Entra ID/Teams sync options
add_ad_teams_sync: Add a Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group synchronization
edit_ad_teams_Sync: Edit a Microsoft Entra ID/Teams group synchronization
automatic_manager_change: Sync group owners as department managers
automatic_manager_change_description: Automatically align department managers in absentify with the owners of your Microsoft Entra ID/Teams groups. Upon activation, this feature updates manager roles to mirror changes in group ownership, ensuring your management structure remains consistent with your organizational setup. New owners become managers; removed owners lose managerial status in linked departments.
no_unused_claims: In this setting, all unused absence claims expire on {{date}}.
max_carry_forward_allowed: In this setting, the employee can carry over a maximum of {{maxCarryForward}} {{unit}} to the next year; on {{date}}, the remaining days that exceed {{maxCarryForward}} will expire.
full_contingent: In this setting, the employee can use their full quota, which they did not utilize in the previous year, until {{date}}. Any unused claims during this period expire on {{date}}.
use_until: In this setting, the employee can use until {{date}} their full unused balance from the previous year. After {{date}}, they still have access to up to {{maxCarryForward}} {{unit}}.
timeghost_workspaces_descrip: Connect your timeghost workspace to absentify to automatically synchronize your absences.
Sync_past_and_future_description: Enable this option to add all past absences to the synchronization from absentify to timeghost. If this option is disabled, only future absences will be synchronized
timeghost_sync_modal_description: Create and configure timeghost synchronizations according to your needs
leaveType_for_timeghost_sync_descrip: Select the leave type you want to sync with timeghost.
Departments_for_timeghost_sync_descrip: Select the departments you want to sync with timeghost.
timeghost_api_key_descript: You can have access to your API key in your timeghost account.
timeghostSyncRemoveSubtitle: Are you sure you want to remove the {{value}} timeghost Sync?
info_text_tg_sync_time_entry_deletion: This will delete all time entries in timeghost for the leave type(s) '{{value}}'. This action cannot be undone.
info_text_tg_sync_future_time_entry_dele: This will delete all future time entries in timeghost for the leave type(s) '{{value}}'. This action cannot be undone.
ad_teams_desc: This setting shows if current department synchronized with AD/Teams Group Synchronization
ad_teams_desc_cross: This setting shows that current department wasn't synchronized with AD/Teams Group Synchronization
ad_teams_desc_check: This setting shows that current department was synchronized with AD/Teams Group Synchronization
cant_change_managers: You can't change managers while you have a AD/Teams Synchronization active
Leave_unit_changed_to: Please be advised that the duration unit has been automatically updated to the corresponding allowance unit: {{unit}}
no_leave_type: At least one leave type must be choosed to proceed
ad_groups_needs_activated: In order to proceed with this feature you need to enable Teams and Entra ID (Azure Active Directory) Groups synchronization
cant_activate_manager_option: Can't activate sync group ownsers as department managers option without proper subscription or addon
cant_manage_managers: You can't manage managers since you have 'Sync group owners as department managers' setting activated in one of your Microsoft Entra ID/Teams Group Synchronizations.
advanced_desc: Define standard absence quotas for new employees assigned to this department. These values are automatically applied for the current and the next fiscal year.
advanced_tooltip: In this section, you can set individual standard values for each absence quota. These settings allow for an efficient and automatic allocation of absence quotas to new team members, based on your department's policies. Once a new employee is added to the department, they receive these predefined quotas for the current and the next fiscal year. This process simplifies the onboarding process for new employees by ensuring they are equipped with the necessary absence quotas from the beginning. Utilize this feature to ensure consistent and fair absence planning within your department. Please note, the current implementation does not yet take the employee's entry date into consideration.
default_allowance_desc: Enable this function to set this allowance as the default. The allowance will then be displayed on the overview page
default_option: By default this synchronization will synchronize existing absentify members to corresponding departments with the group.
public_holiday_day_desc: Edit the name of the public holiday day in different languages.
name: Name
can_be_preformed_only_in_web: You can only perform this action in the web version of absentify, not in Microsoft Teams/Outlook.
comego_disabled_in_this_timeghost_worksp: Tracking of working hours is currently disabled in this timeghost workspace. To enable the synchronization, please activate working hours tracking as a separate instance in the timeghost workspace settings.
users_have_not_yet_logged_and_not_in_tg_: Sync will not affect all users in the selected timeghost workspace and department. Some users have not yet logged in to both apps. Please review the accounts listed below and update them to ensure the sync works properly. If you proceed without updating these accounts, the sync will not be completed for those users.
